summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of One Thousand ($1000.00) Dollars, out of the General Fund in favor of East Roy Street Condemnation Fund, authorized by Ordinance No. 12419, providing for the laying off, extending and establishing of East Roy Street, approved May 18, 1905, which amount represents 2% of the total cost of said improvement, which was to be paid by the public as confirmed by the Superior Court of King County, in Cause No. 48524.
